Name: Electro Hypostasis
Title: Electro Hypostasis
Desc: Code name: Aleph. A high-purity Electro entity.\nEven if you win at rock-paper-scissors, Aleph is not one to admit defeat.
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Electro Hypostasis

24012.Name: Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo
24012.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT] and then separately performs "$[K53]" for <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S24015]</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S24016]</color>.

K53.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>|s1:<color=#FFFFFFFF>prepares</color>
K53.Desc: Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.\nWhen it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepared</color>, the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)\nOnly active characters can <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparation</color> will be interrupted.

C124013.Name: Chains of Warding Thunder
C124013.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K104].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this Summon is on the field:</color> Your opponent will have to spend 1 additional Elemental Die when performing "Switch Character." (Once per Round)

K104.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>
K104.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

24014.Name: Electro Crystal Core
24014.Desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains an <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124014]</color>.

C124014.Name: Electro Crystal Core
C124014.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached would be defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure the character $[K54|s1], and heal them to 1 HP.

K54.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Immunity to Defeat</color>|s1:<color=#FFFFFFFF>will not be defeated</color>
K54.Desc: Certain effects will grant characters an <color=#FFFFFFFF>immunity to being defeated</color> when their HP hits 0, and will heal them for a certain amount thereafter.\nWhen this occurs, characters will not be regarded as having experienced a <color=#FFFFFFFF>defeat.</color> (Hence, their attached equipment and statuses will not be removed, and their Energy will remain uncleared.)

K53.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>|s1:<color=#FFFFFFFF>prepares</color>
K53.Desc: Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.\nWhen it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepared</color>, the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)\nOnly active characters can <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparation</color> will be interrupted.
